q_ch: 产品类型是Dress的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the sewing tasks for dresses. Here's what we've got:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group    | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 11      | March 21, 2024   | April 14, 2024   | Premier Sewers   | 140            | 100              | In Progress 😅 |
| 12      | March 27, 2024   | April 12, 2024   | Master Sewers    | 150            | 120              | Completed ✅ |
| 13      | March 27, 2024   | April 6, 2024    | Master Sewers    | 130            | 120              | Completed ✅ |
| 14      | March 18, 2024   | April 8, 2024    | Master Sewers    | 120            | 120              | Completed ✅ |

Looks like the Master Sewers have been quite busy! If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the products identified in Step1

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.number AS planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.order_product_id IN (14, 13, 11, 12);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the order_product IDs identified in Step2
